channel.title: Azure VMware Solution on This Is My Demo
channel.description: Recent content in Azure VMware Solution on This Is My Demo

item.title: 2025 Licensing Guide: Windows Server, Azure Local, AVS, and VCF
item.description: License Models Demystified: Per Core, Per Socket, Per Subscription Welcome to Part 2 of our “Beyond the Cloud: The Case for On-Premises Virtualization” series. In our introductory post, we explored why organizations are reconsidering their virtualization strategies post-VMware acquisition. In Part 1, we conducted a detailed five-year TCO analysis comparing Windows Hyper-V, Azure VMware Solution (AVS), and Azure Local, revealing how different cost structures impact long-term budgets. A key factor driving those cost differences was how each platform’s licensing model works.
